Through the HathiTrust ETAS, books available through HathiTrust which are also in UVA’s collections will be available online without the additional step of requesting a digital scan. HathiTrust’s online collection contains more than half of the UVA Library’s book collection.

  1. Search for the item in Virgo. Click on the Online Access link, which will take you to the HathiTrust website.
  2. Click on the Check Out button. You will then be able to read the book in your browser.
  3. Your initial checkout period will be one hour. You may continue accessing the work for longer than an hour as long as you are active with the book (turning pages, scrolling, etc.) and no other user is waiting to use it. When you are finished with the book, click the Return Early button so that the next patron can use it.

Additional notes:

  • You will only be able to read the book on screen — unfortunately, no download option for the book will be available.
  • The number of simultaneous users allowed for a given item is limited to the number of copies we own, so please make sure to click the “Return Early” button when you are done with an item.
  • For additional user support documentation, including an FAQ, visit HathiTrust ETAS User Information.
